medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The condition was noted during a follow-up ultrasonographic examination, with subsequent 18F-FDG PET/CT scanning revealing increased uptake in bilateral supraclavicular lymph nodes and the cervical esophagus.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Patient has a history of Fanconi anemia diagnosed at age 5 and underwent bone marrow transplantation at age 12.
medical_history.social_history: Patient had no predisposing factors for esophageal cancer such as reflux, smoking, or alcohol use.
